moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 d5 3. exd5 Qxd5 4. Nc3 Q: thinnk about your pawn structure.  why not qxf3?
moves.7... f6 8. Nb5 Qe7 9. dxe5 fxe5 10. f4 Q: you could have gotten another pawn for your knight with be3
moves.19... Qxg3+ 20. hxg3 Kb8 21. O-O Kxa8 22: good exchange - you separate his pawns
moves.24... bxc6 25. Be3 Nh6 26. Bc5: now you make the mistake of letting him separate your pawns
why not take the rook?  then you're left with rook vs. knight - an easy win
moves.37... Ne3+ 38. Kg3 Rd1 39. Rxg7: besides being as stupid move, you could again have forced the rook exchange with rh8
moves.39... Rg1+ 40. Kf3 Rxg7 41. Kxe3 Re7+ 42: very bad. you could have kept his king away from the pawns with rg6
moves.57... Kc6 58. f8=Q Rxf8+ 59. Kxf8 Kb5 60: don't waste that move - you needed to get your king back quick
